extendedInfo.description: Perfect for the busy nursing professional! NCLEX-PN Exam Prep is Upward Mobilityâs focused exam-prep app for NCSBNâs NCLEX Licensed Practical Nurse Exam on Android. Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.OVERVIEW:This module contains a targeted curriculum of 491 multiple-choice questions. Written by nursing experts, our questions are designed to help identify and reinforce a working knowledge of practical nursing care for prospective Licensed Practical Nurses. FEATURES:*  491 targeted multiple-choice questions.*  Detailed explanations.*  Real-life scenarios that help you to bridge the gap between your nursing education and practical patient application.*  Topics include: clinical problem solving, effective communicating, psychosocial and physiological integrity, safe and effective care, health maintenance and promotion, teaching and learning, and more!*  Exclusive, intuitive interface.*  Study Mode -- Each question is paired with a clear and useful explanation. Study at your own pace!*  Test Mode -- Designed to simulate the exam experience. Set your own question and time constraints. *  Review your answers in both question-by-question and aggregate format.Upward Mobility is not affiliated with nor is this app endorsed by the NCSBN.ABOUT UPWARD MOBILITY:Upward Mobility is an independent test-preparation apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by writers who are subject matter experts and undergoes a thorough review process.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.

reviews.title: Failed
reviews.comment: I was hoping to use this on my last week before test. Now it keepa on crashing everytime I open it. FAILED
reviews.author: Adrian n Lucia Albu

reviews.title: Thanks!!
reviews.comment: Latest update fixed issue of not seeing words running android 4.1.2
reviews.author: Gabriel Romero

reviews.title: A couple errors
reviews.comment: Some of the answers were wrong. So that needs to be fixed and need more reveiw questions. Other than that its a good app to study  for little bit on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great tool when studying on the run. Allows me to make use of my time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have found thus far 7 errors in this question bank. I am only a fifth of the way through the questions. Definitely unreliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It would b nice if it had categories on subject to study each indivdual
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app helps me a lot
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeyee
reviews.comment: This App is great! It helped me pass NCLEX the first time!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What are you talking about Andrew, I\'m a teacher, I have gone threw most of the questions, excellent work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Some answers didn\'t go with the questions, some answers were just wrong. I just took boards this isn\'t even close.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good to study from on the go... love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app, good questions. Like the rationales. Would be nice to be able to bookmark questions for later review, and also sort questions by category.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great study tool when you don\'t have time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not only is this program one of the best to.study, but the customer service is excellent. Thank you guys for the assistance. Now I need to pass!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nika
reviews.comment: Lvn\'s can insert an IV once IV training is done after you get your license but if your going to take boards doing Iv\'s is not acceptable
